Name: Ecchi Cards
About the game: This game is a casual Cards game where you battle your cards against opponent's deck. You can play against AI or challenge players online. Game Features: * mod support: design your own cards, cards sets, battlefield backgrounds or even listen to your own music! * workshop support: upload your works to Steam workshop and let everybody enjoy them! * nice artwork * relaxing background music * casual cards gameplay
Meta Title: Ecchi Cards: Jul 13, 2018, Racing Bros and Full Overview
